imdb.plot outline: Far From Home portrays the life of selected characters: Muslims that have left their home country for several reasons and have started a new life in a different country, without losing their identity and traditions. The show combines the testimonies of lawyers, doctors, architects, students, artist, etc. from countries such as Azerbaijan, Morocco, Saudi Arabia, Iran, Indonesia, Lebanon etc. and their new life in New York, Madrid, Beijing, etc. These are stories about love, courage and self-improvement which proves that we all can be part of a different society and find a new home in the world.
imdb.title: Far from Home
plot: Far From Home portrays the life of selected characters: Muslims that have left their home country for several reasons and have started a new life in a different country, without losing their identity and traditions. The show combines the testimonies of lawyers, doctors, architects, students, artist, etc. from countries such as Azerbaijan, Morocco, Saudi Arabia, Iran, Indonesia, Lebanon etc. and their new life in New York, Madrid, Beijing, etc. These are stories about love, courage and self-improvement which proves that we all can be part of a different society and find a new home in the world.
